channel.title: Impetus
channel.description:
A program about books that have given shape to the 20th century.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Theory of the Leisure Class
item.description: This program features host Joseph J. Schwab and guest T.V. Smith discussing "The Theory of the Leisure Class: An Economic Study of Institutions" by Thorstein Veblen.
item.dc:creator: Schwab, Joseph Jackson, 1909-
item.dc:subject: United States--History--20th century

item.title: Kapital
item.description: This program features host Joseph J. Schwab and guest Abram L. Harris discussing "Kapital" by Karl Marx.
item.dc:creator: Schwab, Joseph Jackson, 1909-
item.dc:subject: Philosophy & Ethics
